headline: Bigoted NYC resident’s alleged reign of terror ends in vicious anti-Asian assault, arrest
author: Joe Marino *
sentences: That’s where Marlon Carr, 47, lived and was arrested Friday morning, after barricading himself inside his apartment following a racist assault on his neighbor, a 39-year-old Asian man, according to law enforcement sources.

Carr allegedly accosted the victim, a 22-year-old Chinese
Comments:
*, Khristina Narizhnaya, and David Meyer
How can a crazy person afford to live in an "expensive building?"
A man who allegedly terrorized his East Harlem neighbors with violent racist screeds for more than a year was finally arrested, sources said.
“He was so angry at people because they make huge noise when they closed the door,” one of his victims told The Post.
Things got so bad at 158th East 126th Street, residents called the 8th floor the “floor of terror,” sources said.
